title.line2: with no tough fibers and rich, sweet flavor

description: Enjoy its sweetness and texture whether eaten raw, lightly boiled, or stir-fried.

soil.title: Fluffy soil rich in microorganisms
soil.text: Grown with compost from Imari beef, our soil allows roots to stretch freely.

water.title: Crystal-clear soft water from layered rocks
water.text: Spring water filtered through natural strata gently nourishes the roots and adds depth to the flavor.

temperature.title: Blessings of temperature differences
temperature.text: The contrast between warm days and cool nights concentrates the sweetness and produces a tender texture.

love.title: Lovingly grown with care and effort
love.text: Our dedication as a farming couple led to a prestigious gold award.

shipping.title: Chilled and shipped immediately after harvest
shipping.text: We deliver directly with freshness perfectly preserved.

award.title: Award-winning quality
award.text: Gold award at the 2024 Vegetable Sommelier Summit

quality.title: Quality far beyond supermarket asparagus
quality.subtitle: Only possible because it’s directly from the farm — achieving the highest quality
quality.body:
What matters most is who grows it and how it's delivered.
Freshly harvested asparagus is delicate — exposure to water or air quickly reduces its freshness.

At Umemura Farm, we store it under precise temperature control right after harvest and ship it on the same day to preserve peak freshness.

This minimal processing and speed create value that exceeds the price.
